title: Episode 282: Le Tigre
description: “Deceptacon” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Le Tigre originally formed in 1998. They released their self-titled debut album in October 1999. Spin Magazine called it one of the best albums of the past 30 years, and Pitchfork called it one of the best albums of the 90s. title: Episode 281: Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young
description: “Our House” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS In 1968, singer and songwriter Graham Nash joined David Crosby and Stephen Stills to form the supergroup Crosby, Stills and Nash. title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs Is Trying to Obstruct Justice From Jail, Prosecutors Say
description: Combs had family carry out a social media campaign on his birthday "with the intention of influencing the potential jury in this criminal proceeding," prosecutors claim.

title: Daniel Ek just cashed out $35.8 million in Spotify shares. But that’s nothing compared to his co-founder… who just cashed out $383.8 million.
description: Spotify’s share price is flying.
